turkish_example_sentence: Sen asla kütüphaneden başka birinin özel kitaplarını almaman lazım.
english_example_sentence: You must never take someone else's personal books from the library.
russian_example_sentence: Ты никогда не должен брать личные книги других людей из библиотеки.
